entry.content:
ConfigHelper - Automate App Repackaging & SCCM Publishing

ConfigHelper simplifies app re-packaging and deployment to SCCM. Save time, reduce errors, and streamline your IT operations.





Key Features

ðŸš€ Automated Repackaging: Convert .exe/.msu files into SCCM-compatible packages with one click.
ðŸ§© SCCM Integration: Publish re-packaged apps directly to SCCM without manual steps.
ðŸ”§ Customization & Flexibility: Tailor deployment scripts, handle dependencies, and version control all within the tool.
ðŸ”’ Security & Compliance: Ensure compliance with enterprise security policies during repackaging.
